summary: I am an enthusiastic worker and an excellent self-learning engineer who enjoys teamwork. Supporting the Mobile communication systems projects in Sudan enabled me to develop my team-leading abilities. In addition to that, I am friendly, dedicated, and quick to learn with excellent communication skills at different levels & fluent English language. I have gained a lot of knowledge besides my telecommunication knowledge throughout my career in Analysis and Process Creation.
